short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lingo is a platform for learning English vocabulary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you looking for an effective and simple way to improve your English vocabulary? With Lingo, learning new words has never been easier and more enjoyable. Lingo helps you strengthen your language skills effortlessly through your browser.

Features:
- 6 Free Vocabulary Books ğŸ“˜: Includes 3,600 words across 6 books, each containing 600 words, categorized for user convenience.
- Flashcard Display ğŸƒ: Words are presented as flashcards for optimal and effective learning.
- Customizable Review Levels ğŸšï¸: Users can set the review level for each word, and the app adjusts word repetition based on these levels.
- Dark and Light Modes ğŸŒ‘ğŸŒ•: Designed in both dark and light modes to enhance user experience.
- Spaced Repetition Algorithm ğŸ”: Uses a spaced repetition algorithm to regularly review words at appropriate intervals, ensuring long-term memory retention.
- Multisensory Learning ğŸ§ğŸ–¼ï¸: Each word is accompanied by images, explanations, examples, and audio pronunciation for comprehensive learning.

How to Use:
1. Install the Lingo extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Open your browser daily and get acquainted with new words.
3. Review flashcards and set the review level for each word.
4. Track your progress with detailed statistics and charts to evaluate and improve your learning.

Why Lingo?
- Solve Vocabulary Deficiency ğŸ§ : Lingo helps you significantly expand your vocabulary.
- Free and Ad-Free ğŸ†“ğŸš«: Lingo is completely free and has no advertisements.
- User-Friendly Design ğŸ‘: Enjoy a simple and user-friendly interface for a delightful learning experience.
- Multisensory Education ğŸ¨: Enhance your learning with audio, images, and examples.
- Continuous Improvement ğŸ”„: Our team continuously updates the extension to provide the best possible experience.

Install the Lingo extension now and embark on a new journey into the world of English language learning! ğŸŒŸ
